# Romegate Properties - Real Estate in Rome

## About
Romegate is a premier real estate agency specializing in buying, selling, and managing properties in Rome, Italy. We provide specialized services for Erasmus students and international clients seeking accommodation in the Eternal City.

## Services
- Property Buying: Expert guidance through Rome's real estate market
- Property Selling: Professional marketing, valuation, and negotiation
- Property Management: Complete management services including maintenance and tenant relations
- Student Accommodation: Specialized services for Erasmus and international students

## Key Features
- Deep knowledge of Roman neighborhoods and real estate market
- Multilingual support (English, Italian, Spanish, French)
- Prime locations near universities and public transport
- Fast and efficient service, especially for students
- Personalized service for all clients

## Contact
- Email: info@romegate.it
- Phone: +39 02 1234 5678
- Address: Via Manzoni 37, 20121 Milano, Italy
- Website: https://romegate.it

## Target Audience
- Property buyers and sellers in Rome
- Erasmus students seeking accommodation
- International students and expatriates
- Property investors

## Content Focus
Real estate listings, student housing guides, market insights, property management services, neighborhood information, legal guidance for property transactions in Italy.

## Specializations
- Student Housing: Erasmus accommodation, semester-based leases, university proximity
- Luxury Properties: High-end apartments and villas in prime locations
- Investment Properties: Commercial and residential investment opportunities
- Property Management: Full-service management for landlords

## Languages Supported
English, Italian, Spanish, French, German

## Service Areas
Rome, Italy - All neighborhoods including Trastevere, Monti, Centro Storico, Prati, San Lorenzo, Testaccio

## Content Updates
- Blog posts: Updated weekly with new articles about real estate trends, student guides, and market insights
- Property listings: Updated daily with new properties, price changes, and availability updates
- Market insights: Updated monthly with comprehensive market analysis and trends
- Student accommodation: Updated weekly during academic semesters, daily during peak enrollment periods
- Service information: Updated quarterly or as services evolve

## API Endpoints (Future Implementation)
- Properties API: /api/properties - GET endpoint for property listings with filtering
- Search API: /api/search - POST endpoint for property search with advanced filters
- Contact API: /api/contact - POST endpoint for contact form submissions
- Blog API: /api/blog - GET endpoint for blog posts with pagination

## Data Structure
- Properties: Include price, location, size, amenities, images, availability
- Blog Posts: Include title, author, date, category, content, images
- Services: Include description, pricing, availability, requirements

## Content Types
- Property Listings: Residential, commercial, student housing
- Blog Articles: Market analysis, guides, student resources, legal information
- Service Descriptions: Buying, selling, management, consulting
